home.title: Welcome to AgriMauritanie

home.digitalMarketDesc: Sell your products directly to city merchants. Connect to markets in Nouakchott, Nouadhibou, Kiffa and more.

home.step2Desc: Register your crops and track their health
home.step3Desc: Use AI to quickly identify diseases

diagnostic.title: AI Disease Diagnostic
diagnostic.subtitle: Take a photo of your sick plant and get a diagnosis in seconds
diagnostic.accuracy: Accuracy: 85-90% | Always verify with an expert if in doubt
diagnostic.uploadPhoto: Click to upload or drag and drop an image
diagnostic.tip: Tip: For best results, take the photo in daylight with good lighting, focusing on the affected parts of the plant (leaves, stems, fruits).

result.title: Diagnostic Result
result.important: Important: This diagnostic is provided for informational purposes. In case of doubt or for serious cases, always consult an agricultural expert.

diagnosticDetails.title: AI Disease Diagnostic
diagnosticDetails.subtitle: Discover how our artificial intelligence can help you protect your crops
diagnosticDetails.accuracy: Accuracy: 85-90% | Always verify with an expert if in doubt

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: Take a photo and get a result

step1.title: Take a photo
step1.description: Photograph the affected part of your plant (leaves, stems, fruits) in daylight with good lighting.

step2.title: Upload the image
step2.description: Upload the photo to our platform. Our system accepts JPG, PNG and JPEG formats.

step3.title: AI Analysis
step3.description: Our artificial intelligence model analyzes the image and compares it with a database of thousands of plant diseases.

step4.title: Get the result
step4.description: Receive a detailed diagnosis with the disease name, confidence level, description and recommended treatments.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read the AgriMauritanie platform terms of use carefully

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the AgriMauritanie platform, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our platform.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: AgriMauritanie is a digital platform that connects Mauritanian farmers to local markets. Our services include:
section2.item1: A digital marketplace for selling agricultural products
section2.item2: An AI diagnostic system for plant diseases
section2.item4: A messaging system between farmers and buyers

section3.title: 3. User Account
section3.content: To use our services, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
section3.item1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials
section3.item3: All activities that occur under your account
section3.item4: Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use of your account

section4.title: 4. Products and Transactions
section4.content: Farmers are responsible for the quality and accurate description of their products. Transactions are conducted directly between parties. AgriMauritanie acts solely as a connection platform and is not responsible for disputes between users.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All platform content, including texts, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of AgriMauritanie or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: AgriMauritanie does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of the information provided. We will not be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By checking the acceptance box during registration, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms of use in their entirety.

about.title: About AgriMauritanie
about.subtitle: Connecting agricultural villages to urban markets

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: AgriMauritanie is an innovative digital platform designed specifically for Mauritanian farmers. Our goal is to connect agricultural villages to city markets, using technology to improve farmers' income and quality of life.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that every farmer deserves access to modern tools and markets to maximize their harvest potential.

step1.title: Local Forecasts
step1.description: Receive accurate weather forecasts for your region in Mauritania (Guidimaka, Gorgol, Brakna, Tarza).

step2.title: Personalized Advice
step2.description: Get recommendations adapted to your specific crops based on weather conditions.

step3.title: Real-time Alerts
step3.description: Be notified of extreme weather conditions (storms, drought, frost) to protect your harvests.
